item.title: WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers Final PC System Requirements Revealed; RTX 2070, RX 5700, Arc A750 Recommended, but Only With DLSS and FSR Enabled
item.content:encoded:
The WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers final PC system requirements have been confirmed, and they are significantly lower than the previously known requirements, although with a caveat that doesn't bode too well.

As confirmed on the game's Steam store page, the game requires at least an Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 1600 CPU, 1 6GB RAM, and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB/AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB GPU. The recommended specifications aren't significantly higher than the minimum, as the developer recommends an Intel Core i7-9700/AMD Ryzen 5 5500 CPU, 16 GB RAM and an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070/AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT/INTEL Arc A750 GPU. These specifications, however, were tested with NVIDIA DLSS and AMD FSR enabled with no mention of target resolution or framerate, so it's impossible to say how well the game will run at any given resolution on these system configurations.

MINIMUM:
OS: Windows10 64bit
Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 1600
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB/AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
DirectX: Version 12
Storage: 60 GB available space
Additional Notes: HDD Supported, SSD Recommended. The above specifications were tested with DLSS/FSR enabled.

RECOMMENDED:
OS: Windows10/11 64bit
Processor: Intel Core i7-9700/AMD Ryzen 5 5500
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070/AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT/INTEL Arc A750
DirectX: Version 12
Storage: 60 GB available space
Additional Notes: SSD Required. The above specifications were tested with DLSS/FSR enabled.

As already mentioned, early WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers PC system requirements were shared a few months back, and the recommended specifications were much beefier, listing more powerful CPUs and GPUs and way more RAM than the updated system requirements shared today. You can check the previous requirements here.

WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers launches on PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S on July 24. The game will also be added to the Xbox Game Pass library on day one.
